title: The Kingdom Within
description: As Princess Meredith's eighteenth birthday approaches, she dreads the inevitable: an arranged marriage to Alder's prince, a stranger she can't fathom spending her life with. Yet, her distaste for the union pales in comparison to the looming threat of war. Without this alliance, her beloved kingdom of Stonefall faces certain doom at the hands of Theros, the relentless King of Talos.Connor, an elite soldier entrusted with Meredithâ€™s safety, arrives at the palace just as things begin to take a turn for the worst. As danger encroaches and betrayal lurks in the shadows, Meredith and Connor must navigate a treacherous path together. Amidst the chaos, they discover an unexpected bond that defies duty and threatens to unravel everything they've known. Will they defy the odds and forge their own destiny, or will fate's cruel hand tear them apart?
author: Samantha Gillespie
